resources.string: By clicking on Create Account I agree to all the Terms & Conditions.

Dear Friend,

Your friend is excited to build Food Spoty community with you for Online Food booking.

Please visit www.foodspoty.com/app to sign up

You can contact us at team@foodspoty.com with any feedback, ideas or if you just want to say hi

Cheers,

The Food Paradise Team
